Antigua – Home to the World’s Most Romantic Resort Published on : Sunday, September 20, 2015
A sailor’s dream, the island of Antigua welcomes cooling trade winds that fills a sail and soothes the soul. It is only adequate that it is also home to the world’s most romantic resort in Sandals Grande Antigua Resort and Spa, which sits on the country’s most famous beach, Dickenson Bay.
Sandals Grande Antigua is located in the cove that is St John’s, Antigua—the largest city of Antigua and Barbuda. Invigorate your senses while visiting the island’s farmers market or the towering St John’s Cathedral, one of many remnants of British influences.
Cool down at any of the 365 beaches on the 14 by 11-mile island and capture the view at the St John’s lighthouse located in the city’s harbor. When you are ready to settle back at Dickenson Bay at Sandals Grande Antigua, welcome the sunset with premium drinks and dine at any of the 11 restaurants offerings. Italian, Asian, Caribbean cuisine—Sandals Grande Antigua has the cuisine that you are in the mood for.
Stay on resort and savor the island life with majestic palm trees at every corner and romantic hideaways at every turn. Or, never leave your suite at all. Enjoy the other all-inclusive amenities, including custom-made mahogany 4 poster king size bed, plush his and hers robes, Egyptian cotton linens, flat-screen TVs and fully stocked bars.
Whether you prefer the outdoors or the plush suite life, Sandals Resorts at Antigua has all you could ever imagine for a romantic Caribbean getaway.
